data.title: A whale failed to sell ai16z and ZEREBRO at the best time and missed out on more than $40 million in profits
data.description: Lookonchain monitoring shows that a whale did not sell ai16z and ZEREBRO at the best time and missed out on more than $40 million in profits. On January 2, the whale made $40.8 million in unrealized profits on ai16z and ZEREBRO, but he did not sell for profit. On January 9, he sold ZEREBRO and lost about $1 million. 10 hours ago, he sold 21.34 million ai16z ($9.18 million) and lost about $1 million again.

data.title: Binance will remove multiple spot trading pairs including QI/BTC
data.description: According to the official announcement, Binance will remove and stop trading of the following spot trading pairs at 03:00 (UTC) on February 6, 2025: QI/BTC, TLM/BTC, VITE/BTC. In addition, Binance will terminate the spot trading robot service for the above spot trading pairs at the same time. Users can still trade these tokens on other trading pairs on Binance. (This newsletter is generated by AI)

data.title: Upbit launches NFT New Year Challenge
data.description: According to the official announcement, Upbit will hold the NFT New Year Challenge event from February 3 to February 17, 2025. During the event, participants can enjoy transaction fee rebates by placing orders for Ethereum and Polygon-based NFTs, and can receive a maximum reward of 0.5ETH. Newly supported NFT collections include Azuki, BEANZOfficial, etc. The event bonus will be issued in the form of ETH, and 22% tax will be deducted for the part exceeding 50,000 won. (This newsletter is generated by AI)

data.title: LBank will provide a subsidy of tens of millions of dollars to users who suffer trading losses between 00:00 on February 2 and 24:00 on February 3
data.description:
Odaily Planet Daily News LBank announced the launch of a 10 million dollar subsidy campaign, which will provide contract bonus subsidies to users who suffer trading losses between 00:00 on February 2, 2025 and 24:00 on February 3. During this period, users who have accumulated contract trading losses reaching the minimum threshold of 100 USDT can receive contract bonus subsidies, up to 400 USDT.
It is reported that the LBank contract bonus is valid for 7 days, and users can use the bonus for contract trading, deduct transaction fees and make up for losses. If profits are generated during use, the profit part can be withdrawn normally.

data.title: WEEX WE-Launch launches VTRU, HOGSCOIN, GOHOME, and SC20
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News WEEX Weike Exchange announced that it has launched WE-Launch projects VTRU (Vitruveo), HOGSCOIN (CryptoHog), GOHOME (GOHOME), and SC20 (Shine Chain). Users who invest in WXT can get 56,000 VTRU, 5,500,000 HOGSCOIN, 10,000 USDT and 25,000 SC20 tokens at the same time. The invested WXT does not need to be locked or pledged, and can be traded and withdrawn at any time.

data.title: Dogecoin Price Final Capitulation Over? 9000% Gains Could be on the Card If..
data.description:
Dogecoin price action history showed a repeated pattern of “final capitulation” events, hinting at a potential turning point, local bottom, before aggressive rallies. Notably, in mid-2023 and again in early 2025, DOGE experienced sharp declines, dropping to lows around $0.085 and $0.20, respectively. These capitulations were followed by swift recoveries, with price spikes reaching $0.57...
source: https://www.thecoinrepublic.com/2025/02/04/dogecoin-price-final-capitulation-over-why-9000-gains-could-be-on-the-cards/

data.title: Analyst Miles Deutscher: The current market reaction to the news shows that it is more bearish at this stage
data.description: Crypto analyst Miles Deutscher wrote on X that there is now a typical sign that the market is currently leaning towards bearishness (lights-off mode). The market's reaction to news can tell investors everything about sentiment. In a bull market trend, the market shrugs off bad news, but rises as soon as good news comes. In a bear market trend, the opposite is true. The market shrugs off good news and falls as soon as bad news comes. It is important to observe early signs of a trend shift, and the market's reaction to news is an easy way to do this.

data.title: The second address on the ARC list spent another $1.495 million to increase its position in the past 9 hours, with a cumulative floating loss of $1.02 million
data.description: According to the monitoring of @ai_9684xtpa, an on-chain data analyst, the second address on the ARC list spent another $1.495 million to increase its ARC position in the past 9 hours. It currently holds 17.2 million ARC and has a cumulative floating loss of $1.02 million. It is reported that the address started to build a position on December 26 last year, buying tokens in three batches, with an average cost of $0.3153 (current price $0.2417); in addition, the address also holds $5.75 million worth of ai16z, and the latest round of position building has caused a floating loss of $4.15 million.
